src_original: trir uccārya ca tān śiṣyān jñātvā sadbhaktivatsalān /  pradhānaṃ śiṣyam ekaṃ tu kṛtvā brūyād idaṃ vacaḥ // 191
ehi vatsa mahāyānaṃ mantracaryānayaṃ vidhim /  deśayiṣyāmi te samyak bhājanas tvaṃ mahānaye // 192
mantraprayogam atulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam /  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ sākyasiṃhādibhir varaiḥ // 194
